attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to petition to get some sort of security on fleetwood cemetery as there has been alot of vandalism especially at night time

rejection.details: Best to report these problems direct to your local authority, please try http://www.wyrebc.gov.uk/Page.aspx?PgeID=51055
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
